sentences.sContent: The country has made great advances since independence.
sentences.sCn: 该国自独立以来发展迅速。

sentences.sContent: ...and give them far greater independence and time for free play...
...and if you live at home you need to develop the same kind of independence you'd have if you were living away...
...Gallagher agrees with Skenazy that many nine-year-olds are ready for independence like taking public transportation alone...
...kids—promoting the idea that modern children need some of the same independence that her generation had...

phrases.pCn: 独立大厅（位于美国费城，独立宣言签字处）

remMethod.val: in(不) ＋ depend(依靠) ＋ ence → 不依靠别人 → 独立

words.tran: 独立的；单独的；无党派的；不受约束的
独立；组合教会制；独立国

trans.tranCn: 独立； 自主； 自立
trans.tranOther: political freedom from control by the government of another country
